description:
NYC at it's best.  Lower East side artist district. Walk to soho , west village and east village and quick subway to  the broken art scene.
Very quiet apartment with extra large  Garden

Meditation

Near restaurants, parks, quite, groceries at the Conner, walk out side you can see the Freedom Building , walk to cool bars and clubs

F, j, M, bus 14, bus 9
name: House@Lower East Side  With Garden
review: Ha was a great host. Her place is small and comfortable and the area is quiet. I really enjoyed my stay.
